testcase.name: Add Booking - Valid Values with Employee Email
testcase.system-out: Given Run Browser...........................................................passed When Browser is up, load ASK MSA VIP login page.............................passed Then Enter Username.........................................................passed Then Enter Password.........................................................passed Then Click Login button.....................................................passed Then Click Course Bookings..................................................passed Then Click Book a Course button.............................................passed Then Select A Course........................................................passed Then Verify that Location Drop Down is Enabled..............................passed Then Select a Location......................................................passed Then Verify that Course Dates Drop Down is Enabled..........................passed Then Select a Course Date...................................................passed Then Verify that On-Board check box is NOT ticked...........................passed Then Select an Employee with registered email address and click Add to List button.passed Then Tick Email Booking Details checkbox if available.......................passed Then Click Add Booking button...............................................passed Then Verify that successful booking message is displayed....................passed Then Verify that successful booking message is correct......................passed Then Verify that user is redirected to Booking page.........................passed Then Verify that Booking is added in the table..............................passed Then Close Browser..........................................................passed
